services.p_one: As an artist and teacher, I provide painting services in various ways materials and on any surfaces, as well as teaching children fine arts at home and in the classroom.
services.p_two: I approach painting and teaching with great responsibility, everyone once achieving an excellent result. There was not a single case when my client I would be dissatisfied.
services.p_three: As materials when painting paintings, materials such as watercolor, oil, charcoal, pencil, pastel, gouache, and as a basis - canvas, canvas on cardboard, cardboard, paper.

payment.p_one: At the moment, my store operates according to a simplified scheme.
payment.p_two: You contact me in any way convenient for you, we agree on the picture and the price, and after the preliminary full payment of the picture and shipment, I send you the picture.
